name: Racing xp
description:
Arrow keys to move. Have fun!

Upgrade your car and win the most races. Every time you win you earn money. Choose different colors. Use p key to start the game again.

This project is made for gdevelop's game jam by @Ndaldal, @kevin eleven(me also the host of this team), @macosjam, @prod marrow. Special credits to kenney nl for the assets
